**Metalogix – Content Matrix License and Maintenance and Support Renewal**
### Bid Opportunity
Shared Services Canada (Shared Services Canada) is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers for the renewal of Metalogix Content Matrix licenses, maintenance, and support services. This tender falls under the tender opportunities by trade agreement category.

### Tender Information
- **Solicitation Number**: BPM021439/26558
- **Tender Reference**: SSC-24-00026558:T
- **Publication Date**: May 24, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date**: June 5, 2024, at 2:00 p.m. (local time)
- **Location**: Quebec (excluding NCR)

### Contract Requirements
The services entail the renewal of Metalogix Content Matrix licenses, maintenance, and support. This RFP is open to any supplier who meets the eligibility requirements specified in the Request for Proposal document.

### Important Details
This procurement is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). Respondents are expected to consent to the terms and conditions of the CFTA prior to submission.

### Description of Goods or Services
The scope of work involves the renewal of Metalogix Content Matrix licenses, maintenance, and support services.
